fields.Alias: Alias, usually a shortened version of the agent's name
fields.Username: Unique username for the agent in Salesforce

fields.RecordTypeId: Record type ID, typically for 'Person Account'

fields.ClosedDate: Date when the case was closed in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format
fields.ContactId: ID of the contact associated with this case. References Contact object
fields.CreatedDate: Date when the case was created in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format
fields.IssueId__c: ID of the Issue associated with this case
fields.OrderItemId__c: ID of the Order Item associated with this case
fields.OwnerId: The latest owner of the case. References User object
fields.Status: Status of the case, e.g., 'New', 'Working', 'Escalated', etc
fields.Subject: Subject of the case

fields.CatalogId: ID of the catalog this category belongs to
fields.Name: Name of the product category

fields.IsActive: Boolean to mark if the product is active
fields.Name: Name of the product

fields.IsActive: Boolean to mark if the price book is active
fields.Name: Name of the price book
fields.ValidFrom: Start date for the price book in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format
fields.ValidTo: End date for the price book in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format

fields.Pricebook2Id: ID of the price book this entry belongs to. References Pricebook2 object
fields.Product2Id: ID of the product associated with this price book entry. References Product2 object

fields.AccountId: ID of the customer account. References Account object
fields.EffectiveDate: Effective date of the order in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
fields.Pricebook2Id: ID of the price book this order belongs to. References Pricebook2 object
fields.Status: Status of the order, typically 'Draft' or 'Activated'

fields.OrderId: ID of the order this item belongs to. References Order object
fields.PriceBookEntryId: ID of the price book entry for this order item. References PricebookEntry object
fields.Product2Id: ID of the product associated with this order item. References Product2 object

fields.MessageDate: Timestamp when the message was sent
fields.ParentId: ID of the case related to this email. References Case object
fields.Subject: Subject of the email

fields.AccountId: ID of the customer account. References Account object
fields.CaseId: ID of the case related to this chat. References Case object
fields.OwnerId: ID of the agent who owned the chat. References User object

fields.CaseId__c: ID of the case this history entry is related to. References Case object
fields.CreatedDate: The date when this change was made
fields.Field__c: Specifies the field or type of change. One of ['Case Creation', 'Owner Assignment', 'Case Closed']
fields.NewValue__c: The new value after the change. References User object if the type of change is 'Owner Assignment' else null
fields.OldValue__c: The previous value before the change. References User object if the type of change is 'Owner Assignment' else null
